about_desc: Front-end developer with a passion for transforming ideas into seamless, interactive web experiences. I combine aesthetic design with clean, efficient code to build intuitive, user-friendly interfaces. Driven by a love for coding and a commitment to excellence, I create dynamic and engaging digital experiences that prioritize both functionality and visual appeal.

freelancer.title: Freelancer works
freelancer.desc: As a freelancer, I have contributed to a wide range of web projects, including news platforms and e-commerce stores. My work has involved integrating secure payment systems, optimizing websites for responsiveness and SEO, and refining user interfaces to enhance overall user experience. Additionally, I have strong experience in developing RESTful APIs, integrating third-party services, and managing relational databases effectively
